The Premier League is an option we cannot trade for anything else at this stage of the season for Arsenal. If paying 50m for Mudryk will win us the league come 2023,then it's a good deal, nice bargain. https://t.co/JK6E9OjtLx

Biggest dilemma for Arsenal right now is do you pay £50m+ for someone like Mudryk in Jan or wait in the summer for a better option. It’s a trade off. Last January, not signing a striker proved costly in the top 4 race but we got Jesus for £45m in the summer which is a great deal.
